WELCOME:
&eWelcome to &l&1C&ar&ea&6z&9e&5d&fC&7r&6a&cf&dt&6!
&r&7CrazedCraft is a Minecraft: Pocket Edition server network dedicated to bringing you new, fun and unique gamemodes! Feel free to contact us on twitter (@CrazedCraft) if you would like to get in touch! From everyone on the team, we hope you enjoy your stay!
REGISTER_PROMPT: &eThis account is not registered, to play you must register by typing your desired password directly into chat.
LOGIN_PROMPT: &eThis account is registered, please login by typing your password directly into chat.
CONFIRM_PASSWORD_PROMPT: &aThanks! &ePlease enter your password again to confirm.
EMAIL_PROMPT: &ePlease enter your email directly into chat to finish the registration process.
REGISTER_ERROR: &cOops, looks like there was an error registering your account. Perhaps you should try again later?
LOGIN_SUCCESS: &aYou are now logged in, we hope you enjoy your stay!
PASSWORDS_NO_MATCH: &cSorry but the passwords you entered don't match!
INVALID_EMAIL:
&cSorry but that isn't a valid email address!
Please enter a valid email address to complete your account registration.
MUST_BE_PLAYER_FOR_COMMAND: &cYou must be a player to execute this command!
NEW_PARTY_REQUEST: &6Party request from &a{args1} &6will expire in 60 seconds, type &a/party {args1} &6to accept!
PARTY_SENT_REQUEST: &aParty request sent to &6args1 &awill expire in 60 seconds.
PARTY_ALREADY_HAS_REQUEST: &6{args1} &calready has a party request from you!
COMMAND_BANNED: &cYou do not have permission to use this command
PASSWORD_IN_CHAT: &6- &cDon't share your password or your account might get hacked!
CHAT_COOLDOWN: &6- &cYou must wait three seconds before sending another message.
MESSAGES_TOO_SIMILAR: &6- &cYour messages are too similar, please don't spam the chat.
SERVER_RESTART: &l&1C&ar&ea&6z&9e&5d&fC&7r&6a&cf&dt &6Duels&r &bis restarting, we will be back in a moment!
